channel.title: Online on Klinkenberg
channel.description: Recent content in Online on Klinkenberg

item.title: My Online Lecture Setup
item.description: Strap in there, because this is going to be a deep dive. In a previous blog post, I already described how you could use open broadcast software (OBS) to overly a logo or presentation on your webcam feed, and switch between scenes while presenting. Based on that experience, I recently gave a two-hour online workshop taking this to the next level. The video below shows live interaction with the students.
